title: Mission Control Architectures for Analog Spaceflight Campaigns
authors: I. Taame, L. Schneider, M. Rossi
abstract: Presents a modular MCC stack leveraging XTCE-driven telemetry ingestion and automated anomaly triage tailored for analog astronaut campaigns.

title: Dynamic Telemetry Prioritization for Life Support Systems
abstract: Demonstrates CCSDS urgent APID routing with telemetry prioritization achieving sixfold latency reduction for life support alerts.

title: Edge-to-Orbit Health Monitoring for Analog Habitats
authors: I. Taame, S. Alvarez, P. Becker
abstract: Describes a hybrid hardware/software stack enabling high-rate biomedical telemetry with integrity validation and predictive analytics.
